name: Hatrocity
description:
Hatrocity was made by our team in less than or about 3 hours per person for the Trijam #212: The 3 hour game jam.

Is there such a thing as too much style? We don't think so! And what is more stylish than hats? That's right, nothing! So it is time to collect some hats. Catch them before they hit the ground, and don't drop them.

We hope you enjoy the game! And thanks for playing!

The game can be played with the keyboard or a controller.

- Move left and right with: A and D, left and right arrow keys, or the stick on the controller.

Our team consisted out of 4 people:

- The sound effects are made by Nabiki and Pickel Yarr

- The artwork is made by Zhiris

- The coding and unity implementation is done by Jenk
